name: K.I.N. (Hazedoron, Windreda, JLawless, koopastroopa, Gonellicon4, Zhakyria, Cplshephard)
name_original: K.I.N. (Hazedoron, Windreda, JLawless, koopastroopa, Gonellicon4, Zhakyria, Cplshephard)
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

WASD to Move
SPACEBAR to Jump
E to Interact
LEFT CLICK to Attack
RIGHT CLICK to toggle EAT GUN
RIGHT CLICK + LEFT CLICK to Grapple
RIGHT CLICK + Q to shoot Scrap


The world has suffered from fallout that has forced humanity to take to the skies. Living aboard makeshift flying cities has made humans reliant on scrap: parts of machinery that are consistently recycled to repair necessary systems such as engines, weapons, and air filtration systems. However it is occasionally necessary to build something new, especially amidst desperate circumstances. K.I.N. is the story of a newly built robot aboard the airship New Dawn, and things aren’t clearly as they should be. Venture through the recesses of New Dawn on a journey in discovering purpose and self identity.
